description:
Executive Director Mishiro`s new project, Project Krone, begins. It consists of idols who are directly handpicked by the executive director herself. Meanwhile, P is suddenly informed that the Cinderella Project is going to come under review at 346 Product
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Which Way Should I Go to Get to the Castle?
